main.name: Xu Gu
main.bio: Hi there! I'm a graduate student from SF State, majoring in Computer Science. I was software engineer at Tiktok before. I have a passion for software development and love to create new things. I created a bunch of interesting software and websites. I'm looking forward to working with you!
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to to build any software for your business.!

quotes1.title: I Would Love to make your Ideas real
quotes1.description: I love graphic design and photography and have been working on my portfolio since 2016. You can download my resume in order to learn the details of my professional life as a designer and photographer. Contact me and we will discuss your projects!

quotes2.title: 时时勤拂拭，勿使惹尘埃

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Developed MyCareerCoach, a web application that helps students to find their career path.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Developed and maintained testing infrastructure for Tiktok's ads billing services.

work.title: Software Engineer Intern
work.description: Developed Tiktok ads monitoring system to supervise non-compliant ads leaking.

resume.skillssectiontitle: Motivated by the Desire to achieve Success
resume.skillssectiondescription: I am a software engineer with a passion for developing innovative programs that expedite the efficiency and effectiveness of organizational success. Well-versed in technology and writing code to create systems that are reliable and user-friendly. I am a team player and leader who listens to the needs of the team and adapts to the changing environment. I am always committed to staying current with the latest technologies and industry trends. I am a quick learner and a great problem solver. I am always looking for opportunities to learn and grow.

projects.title: YouDescribeX
projects.description: YouDescribe is a powerful platform designed to make YouTube videos accessible through audio descriptions. It allows developers and users to add descriptions to existing YouTube content, enhancing the accessibility of videos for individuals with visual impairments and others who benefit from audio descriptions.

projects.title: My Career Coach
projects.description: MyCareerCoach is a web application that helps students to create resumes and prepare for interviews. It provides professional resume templates and interview questions.

projects.title: Zesty
projects.description: Zesty is a User-friendly Recipe Sharing Platform that allows user to share their recipes and get feedback from other users. It also provides AI-assist recipe generation and nutrition analysis.

projects.title: Zeolite Database
projects.description: Zeolite Database is a web application that provides a comprehensive database of zeolite structures and properties. It allows users to search, visualize, and analyze zeolite structures and properties.

projects.title: MovieINTPN
projects.description: MovieINTPN (Movie Interpreter) is a command line tool to add caption in user-specified languages to movies

projects.title: Fitbot
projects.description: FitBot analyzes your workout videos to offer personalized motion improvement tips. Record, upload, and receive expert feedback to optimize your form and performance in just a few simple steps.

testimonials.text: I had the opportunity to mentor Xu Gu at Nanjing University, and I am consistently impressed by his skills and dedication. Xu excels in logical thinking, problem-solving, and interdisciplinary research. He led projects such as the Construction of Zeolite Adsorption Database and excelled in the RNA Secondary Structure Prediction Competition with innovative deep learning solutions. His proficiency in programming, modeling, and data analysis has been invaluable to his peers and projects. Xu's comprehensive skills affirm his capabilities. I highly recommend Xu for any advanced opportunity or professional role.

I have known Gu Xu for about two years, first as his mentor during his internship at TikTok. During this time, he developed an online advertising leak monitoring system, demonstrating his exceptional programming skills and high-quality work. Xu's teamwork and communication abilities were outstanding; he effectively collaborated with peers and assisted in problem-solving. His strong learning ability was evident when he quickly mastered the front-end framework needed for integrating the system into our internal tool platform. Xu is a driven and talented individual who excels in programming, teamwork, and handling challenges. I fully believe in his potential and highly recommend him for any future endeavors.

awwards.title: Secend place in Deep Learning Competition for RNA Structure Prediction
awwards.description: Developed and trained a sophisticated deep learning model using TensorFlow to accurately predict the unpaired probabilities at each position of an RNA chain, leveraging advanced time series algorithms including LSTM and Transformer.
